import json

# Simulate what the quiz endpoint should return
mock_quiz_response = {
    ''quiz'': [
        {
            ''question'': ''What is a ROS 2 Node?'',
            ''options'': [
                ''A fundamental building block that performs computation'',
                ''A physical robot part'',
                ''A type of sensor'',
                ''A networking protocol''
            ],
            ''correct_index'': 0,
            ''explanation'': ''In ROS 2, nodes are the fundamental building blocks for computation. Each node performs a specific task.''
        },
        {
            ''question'': ''How do ROS 2 nodes communicate with each other?'',
            ''options'': [
                ''Direct memory access'',
                ''File system'',
                ''Topics and Services'',
                ''HTTP requests''
            ],
            ''correct_index'': 2,
            ''explanation'': ''ROS 2 nodes communicate using Topics \(pub/sub messaging\) and Services \(request/response\).''
        },
        {
            ''question'': ''What is the default middleware used by ROS 2?'',
            ''options'': [
                ''MQTT'',
                ''DDS \(Data Distribution Service\)'',
                ''ZeroMQ'',
                ''gRPC''
            ],
            ''correct_index'': 1,
            ''explanation'': ''ROS 2 uses DDS \(Data Distribution Service\) as its default middleware for communication.''
        }
    ]
}

print\(''Quiz Endpoint Response Structure Test''\)
print\(''='' * 50\)
print\(\)

# Validate structure
quiz_data = mock_quiz_response[''quiz'']
print\(f''âœ“ Quiz contains {len\(quiz_data\)} questions''\)

for i, q in enumerate\(quiz_data\):
    print\(f''\\nQuestion {i+1}:''\)
    print\(f''  âœ“ Has question: {q[""question""][:50]}...''\)
    print\(f''  âœ“ Has {len\(q[""options""]\)} options''\)
    print\(f''  âœ“ Correct index: {q[""correct_index""]}''\)
    print\(f''  âœ“ Correct answer: {q[""options""][q[""correct_index""]]}''\)
    print\(f''  âœ“ Has explanation: {q[""explanation""][:40]}...''\)

print\(\)
print\(''='' * 50\)
print\(''All validation checks passed!''\)
print\(\)
print\(''JSON Response:''\)
print\(json.dumps\(mock_quiz_response, indent=2\)\)
")
